topic: White Oil Market Poised for Steady Growth, Projected to USD 3.16 billion by 2032

ideas.title: The White Van Man's Oil Change
ideas.premise: A stereotypical 'white van man' refuses premium engine oil, demanding only 'white oil' for his van, oblivious to its actual purpose.
ideas.why_funny: Plays on cultural stereotypes and misunderstanding of technical terms for comedic effect.

ideas.title: Buckingham Palace's Facelift
ideas.premise: Royal workmen are applying white oil to Buckingham Palace, arguing it's 'anti-ageing' and better than botox for the monarchy.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposes the grandeur of the monarchy with everyday anti-aging routines.

ideas.title: Brexit's Secret Weapon
ideas.premise: A bewildered politician unveils a barrel of white oil, claiming it's the secret ingredient to boosting the post-Brexit British economy.
ideas.why_funny: Satirizes the unrealistic promises and unclear strategies often associated with Brexit.

ideas.title: Pigeon Beauty Pageant
ideas.premise: London pigeons are competing in a beauty pageant, with the final 'sheen' added using tiny spray bottles of white oil.
ideas.why_funny: The absurdity of pigeons in a beauty pageant, enhanced by the unexpected use of industrial oil.

ideas.title: Boris's Secret Formula
ideas.premise: Boris Johnson is in his shed, concocting a 'hair rejuvenation' formula using only white oil and a badger brush.
ideas.why_funny: Plays on Boris Johnson's infamous hair and rumoured eccentricities.
